diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer
actor Admin
rectangle ECommerceWebsite {
    usecase "Browse Products" as UC1
    usecase "Search Products" as UC2
    usecase "Place Order" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Order" as UC4
    usecase "Add Product" as UC5
    usecase "Remove Product" as UC6
}
Customer --> UC1
Customer --> UC2
Customer --> UC3
Customer --> UC4
Admin --> UC5
Admin --> UC6
Admin --> UC4
UC3 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC1 .> UC2 : <<include>>
UC5 .> UC6 : <<extend>>
@enduml
raw_diagram:
@startuml
actor Customer
actor Admin

rectangle ECommerceWebsite {
    usecase "Browse Products" as UC1
    usecase "Search Products" as UC2
    usecase "Place Order" as UC3
    usecase "Manage Order" as UC4
    usecase "Add Product" as UC5
    usecase "Remove Product" as UC6
}

Customer --> UC1
Customer --> UC2
Customer --> UC3
Customer --> UC4

Admin --> UC5
Admin --> UC6
Admin --> UC4

UC3 .> UC4 : <<include>>
UC1 .> UC2 : <<include>>
UC5 .> UC6 : <<extend>>
@enduml
